    • Uses of MetricFactoryProvider in com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production

      Classes in com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production that implement MetricFactoryProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  AletheiaBuilder.InternalBreadcrumbProducerMetricFactoryProvider
      A special case AletheiaMetricFactoryProvider used only when reporting metrics from a breadcrumb dedicated DatumProducer, that is, a DatumProducer whose only purpose in life is to produce breadcrumbs (breadcrumb is itself, a special kind of datum).

      Classes in com.outbrain.aletheia.metrics that implement MetricFactoryProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AletheiaMetricFactoryProvider
      An abstract class for Aletheia specific metrics with pre-defined component names.
      class  DefaultMetricFactoryProvider
      The default implementation for Aletheia specific metrics with pre-defined component names and hierarchical metric tree structure.
